mapper.select:
select
a.USER_ID as userId, a.USER_NAME as userName, a.LOGIN_NAME as loginName, a.TEL as tel, a.PASSWORD as password, a.SEX as sex, a.ORG_ID as orgId, a.ROLE_ID as roleId, a.ROLE_IDS as roleIds, a.STATUS as status, a.SORT_NO as sortNo, a.REMARK as remark, a.VER as ver, b.ORG_NAME as orgName, c.ROLE_NAME as roleName
from T_SYS_USER a
left join T_SYS_ORG b on a.ORG_ID = b.ORG_ID left join T_SYS_ROLE c on a.ROLE_ID = c.ROLE_ID
order by ${dto.orderBy}
